statements: SELECT * FROM schedule_reminders;
SELECT id, user_id, reminder_text FROM schedule_reminders WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT reminder_text, user_id, schedule_time FROM schedule_reminders WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, created_at FROM schedule_reminders WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM schedule_reminders ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule_reminders WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY schedule_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reminder_text, schedule_time FROM schedule_reminders WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND reminder_text LIKE '%meeting%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, DATE_FORMAT(schedule_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_time FROM schedule_reminders WHERE reminder_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users, DATE(created_at) AS date FROM schedule_reminders GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reminders FROM schedule_reminders GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_reminders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, schedule_date FROM Schedule WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time FROM Schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2021-09-01';
SELECT reminder_text, reminder_date, reminder_time FROM Reminder WHERE is_completed = FALSE ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, schedule_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Schedule WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_date > '2023-01-01' AND schedule_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM Schedule WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY schedule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE schedule_time > '08:00:00' OR schedule_name LIKE '%meeting%' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_name, activation_status FROM voice_assistant ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time, reminder_text FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT assistant_id, assistant_name FROM voice_assistant WHERE activation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, reminder_text FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT assistant_name FROM voice_assistant WHERE activation_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM schedules JOIN users ON schedules.user_id = users.user_id
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, schedule_time FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_text FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE enabled = TRUE;
SELECT assistant_name FROM voice_assistants WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY assistant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, schedule_name FROM schedules WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time FROM schedules WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reminder_text FROM reminders WHERE reminder_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reminder_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE enabled = TRUE ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time FROM schedules WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM schedules JOIN users ON schedules.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT schedule_name, schedule_time, user_id FROM schedules WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM schedules GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
